actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide the States with maximum flexibility in their programs of social services under the public assistance titles of that act.

summary.text: Provides that nothing in specified titles of the Social Security Act shall be construed to restrict the freedom of a State (with respect to social services the cost of which is shared by the Federal Government) to determine: (1) what services will make available under its State plans; (2) the persons eligible for such services; (3) the manner in which such services are provided; and (4) any limitations on the receipt of such social services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide the States with maximum flexibility in their programs of social services under the public assistance titles of that act.
